title: Best Buy Font?
content:
I was wondering if you guys could assist me in figuring out what font Best Buy uses for their logo and gift card graphic? Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021031059im_/http:/typophile.com/files/images-1_5732.jpeg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021031059im_/http:/typophile.com/files/images_4510.jpeg)
author: pantone354

comments.content: This belongs in the Type ID section, where the ID gurus are hanging out.

I've moved the thread for you. :^) But if you still want to know where the Type ID forum is, check here: [http://typophile.com/forum/29](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021031059/http:/typophile.com/forum/29 "http://typophile.com/forum/29")
